channel.title: Source to decide!
channel.description: Ok everybody! I'm new. I want to be a Java Engineer when I graduate. So I thought, why not create an RSPS! My friend is attempting to make one and so I know how to portforward and all that. I have some HTML, PHP, and Networking skills. But my main question is...What is the easiest/user-friendly/nooby source to use? I don't know how to code Java at all. So, links to some very helpful Threads/posts would be wonderful. Thanks guys!

item.title: Source to decide!
item.dc:creator: @x1_att_ftw_x x1 att ftw x
item.description:
@x1_att_ftw_x wrote:

DELTA, is the most Basic server you’ll fine

Read full topic

item.title: Source to decide!
item.dc:creator: @Jangles14 Jangles14
item.description:
@Jangles14 wrote:

Ok, I will try Delta. I’ve done some research and a couple of people have said that Project Insanity is pretty easy. But I need something that will start me out with the basics.

Read full topic

item.description:

Delta is a nice source to start with, its easy at first but when attempting harder things it gets harder

item.title: Source to decide!
item.dc:creator: @Jangles14 Jangles14
item.description:
@Jangles14 wrote:

Ok everybody! I’m new. I want to be a Java Engineer when I graduate. So I thought, why not create an RSPS! My friend is attempting to make one and so I know how to portforward and all that. I have some HTML, PHP, and Networking skills. But my main question is…What is the easiest/user-friendly/nooby source to use? I don’t know how to code Java at all. So, links to some very helpful Threads/posts would be wonderful. Thanks guys!
